name: Limited Edition Personalized Cassette -BRIGHT FUTURE- BLUE//BLACK (ALBUM) MIXTAPE
description:
All our cassettes are dubbed here in Brooklyn on four track. The tapes are mixed and mastered to stereo tape for that warm Nite Thief haze. The recordings are intimate and romantic. We do these one by one and each cassette comes with artwork and is personalized by one of our artists along with a surprise goodie. We also have CD-R's in limited quantities. We do these all by hand so they take a lot of time and are made with love. 

Includes immediate download of 13-track album of MP3 320.
